name: deleteHdfsTemplate
description: Deletes the specfied HDFS directory template. All associated HDFS directories are deleted.

id.description: ID of the HDFS directory template to remove.

preserve_snapshots.description: A flag that indicates whether the snapshots of the HDFS directories of this template are converted to relics or deleted. By default, snapshots are converted. Set this flag to 'false' to delete the snapshots.
